channel.title: I need help with: player is already in combat
channel.description:
hey guys! :D
i have a little but very :mad: problem
when i go into my pkbox(to pk ) and i attack someone i just can fight with this person. but when this person leaves the area, and someone else try's to attack me. he gets the messenge: player is already in combat
and im not!
does anyone know a code edit or something to fix this little :mad: problem?

item.title: I need help with: player is already in combat
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

I actually had this issue awhile back, all you need to do is make the server know the player isn’t under attack if that player’s attack is reset.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with: player is already in combat

item.title: I need help with: player is already in combat
item.dc:creator: @peoplereaper2 peoplereaper2
item.description:
@peoplereaper2 wrote:

its in the client file look for the combat section it will be like player is in combat then the little code for the time you need to wait to attackt them if thats at 0 then it will screw it up make it like 5 to eliminate multi combat there and yet then you can still fight som1 after som1 else runs

Read full topic
item.source: I need help with: player is already in combat
